item.title: My take on domain warping
item.description: Domain warping: a procedural method for generating natural-looking patterns and shapes. I’ve used this technique for a long time, and the results can be beautiful and strangely organic. This post will explore my (slightly different) approach, and some of the images this approached helped produce.
